A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Awful movie. Rian Johnson tries too hard to create twists in the plot\, but they all end up being pointless as they take the story into the same direction it would have gone had the twists not been there to begin with.\n\nSome new and interesting concepts were introduced but ultimately thrown out the window by the end of the movie. Unfortunately\, the majority of this film ended up being a rehash of \"The Empire Strikes Back\" mixed with \"Return of the Jedi\"\, but without any significant character/story development.
